study.title: My Studies
study.description: Here are my studies and academic background:

degree.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
degree.description: Graduate of the Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science from UASD, with solid training in software development and maintenance, information systems, databases and networks. Prepared to face technological challenges in small, medium and large organizations, with a focus on software engineering and business solutions.

skills.title: Skills & Github Stats
skills.description: Here are some of my skills and GitHub statistics. You can see more details about my projects and contributions on my GitHub profile.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: I am a Computer Science graduate with comprehensive training in the development of technological solutions and a strong focus on modern web development. I work with JavaScript ecosystem technologies such as React, Angular, Vue and Node.js, creating efficient, scalable and user-centered applications.
about.paragraph2: I have developed projects ranging from designing dynamic interfaces to implementing business logic in frontend and backend, including integrations such as secure email sending, advanced form validation and reliable data handling. My experience includes working with non-relational databases (MongoDB) and relational databases (MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server), as well as using Git and GitHub for collaborative code management.
about.paragraph3: Additionally, I have knowledge in UX/UI design using Figma, which allows me to unite the technical part with an intuitive and attractive visual experience. I define myself as a proactive, responsible professional in permanent updating, with the objective of providing innovative and quality solutions in each project I develop.
